title: Riot DDOS'ing? Loss Forgiven
body: Well, I was in a ranked game ( for prov ) and the server's started to go crazy? Loss Forgiven for people who were affected? I think some people actually lost because of this when they were high ahead since some people connect earlier than others and in teamfights the carry coming back or anyone can make a huge difference.

replies.body: Well I didn't and when 4 / 6 on my Prov, it could've been a 5/5 and gotten to a better rank like gold instead of silver 2 if they gave me one. But it's fine since using plat tactics in silver elo crushes everyone.
I just got a loss forgiven.....

Its so fking sad I just had a game ddodsing all game... IT IS NOT LOSS PREVENTED ITS A NORMAL DEFEAT... FK THIS NOW IM 2-2 FOR PLACEMENTS RIOT IM ON THE VERGE OF QUITTING YOUR %%%%TY GAME!!!#!^@&282^@;@
This is going on in a game my friend is playing right now, really hope it will have no result/loss forgiven...

This issue has affected ONLY TWO of my many games over the last 24 hours, random disconnects/reconnects. My team ended up winning though (somehow!). Is it a server issue? or something else? And any idea on what's causing it/any fixes?

My ranked game just then all players on both teams were constantly disconnecting for seconds to minutes at a time. As time went on they got larger, one disconnect lasted about 3 minutes and everyone reconnected at the same time, things were running smoothly then it just disconnected again. Waiting for 10 minutes with the "attempting to reconnected" then quit. Restart LoL, game doesn't exist. So I got a loss prevention I guess but our team was doing quite well despite the DC'ing.
